StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateO.cerWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@O.cerWaiverID int = 0, @NWAID int, @WaiverSubmitDate date.me, @WaiverOccasionID int, @WaiverTypeID int, @WaiverDetails varchar(255) = NULL, @WaiverStatusCode char(1), @ApprovalDate date.me = NULL, @DisapprovalDate date.me = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15)
AS
DECLARE @ApprovalNumber int
--- DEFINE THE APPROVAL NUMBER SET @ApprovalNumber = CASE @WaiverStatusCode WHEN 'A' THEN @O.cerWaiverID ELSE NULL END
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OFFICER_WAIVER WHERE OFFICER_WAIVER_ID = @O.cerWaiverID AND NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- UPDATE THE WAIVER UPDATE OFFICER_WAIVER SET WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE = @WaiverSubmitDate, WAIVER_OCCASION_ID = @WaiverOccasionID, WAIVER_TYPE_ID = @WaiverTypeID, WAIVER_DETAILS = @WaiverDetails, WAIVER_STATUS_CODE = @WaiverStatusCode, APPROVAL_NUMBER = @ApprovalNumber, APPROVAL_DATE = @ApprovalDate, DISAPPROVAL_DATE = @DisapprovalDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE()
WHERE OFFICER_WAIVER_ID = @O.cerWaiverID AND NWA_ID = @NWAID END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT THE WAIVER INSERT INTO OFFICER_WAIVER (NWA_ID, WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE, WAIVER_OCCASION_ID, WAIVER_TYPE_ID, WAIVER_DETAILS, WAIVER_STATUS_CODE, APPROVAL_NUMBER, APPROVAL_DATE, DISAPPROVAL_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWAID, @WaiverSubmitDate, @WaiverOccasionID, @WaiverTypeID, @WaiverDetails, @WaiverStatusCode, @ApprovalNumber, @ApprovalDate, @DisapprovalDate, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
